articles.description: Liverpool are plotting a raid on Barcelona for Gavi and Ronald Araujo, Chelsea fancy a Brazil midfielder, while West Ham's winger bid has failed.
articles.content: Liverpool are plotting a double raid on Barcelona for two of their brightest stars with Gavi first up, Chelsea fancy a Brazil midfielder, while Saturday’s transfer gossip claims West Ham have seen a … [+4150 chars]
